Title: Relates to identification requirements for obtaining a driver's license and to repeal certain provisions of the vehicle and traffic law relating thereto
Summary: Relates to identification requirements for obtaining a driver's license.
LawCode: Amd §§490 & 502, rpld §502 sub 1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to identification requirements for obtaining a driver's license; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
